subject: Logging Messages
msgSnippet: Within the TestRunner object there is a PrintStream (enveloped by the ResultPrinter object).  I d like to be able to pass messages to this stream, some sort of
messageBody:
Within the TestRunner object there is a PrintStream (enveloped by the
ResultPrinter object). I'd like to be able to pass messages to this
stream, some sort of log. Is there any way to do this? Or is this
so against the JUnit philosophy that it is not allowed.
